ExtlRecShrRecordMap.name: ExtlRecShrRecordMap
ExtlRecShrRecordMap.description: Represents the lead or opportunity being mapped between a partner and vendor for Partner Connect.

ExtlRecShrCnctId.description: ID of the external record share connection.

ExtlRecord.description: ID of the lead or opportunity record on the external system.

InboundStatus.description: Status of imports and updates received.

InternalRecordId.description: ID of the lead or opportunity record on the internal system.

IsImported.description: Indicates whether the record originated on the internal system (true) or external system (false).

LastModifiedSent.description: Timestamp of the last record update between the vendor and partner. This field doesnâ€™t capture when the result is received.

OutboundStatus.description: Status of exports, updates, and results received.

UniqueRecordKey.description: Record key used internally for indexing. If IsImported is false, then this field contains the InternalRecordId value. If IsImported is true, this field contains the ExtlRecord value.
